full_threads.body:
Pay $0 Insertion & Final Value Fees on the first 10 items you list & sell. T&Cs apply.
View in Browser
My eBay Sell Seller Centre Help & Contact
WP Perk, you could have made $816* on eBay
On average, this is how much everyday people made on eBay last year. We can help you get selling this year with $0 Insertion & Final Value fees on the next 10 items you list & sell.**
Take up Offer ➔
*Based on 2018 eBay internal data. To be used as a reference only. Individual results may vary.
eBay does not guarantee that sellers will achieve this sales amount.

**Other fees may apply. Ends 03 July 2020 . Exclusions & T&Cs apply.
Did you Know?
$4,200
Is the estimated value of unwanted items held onto per Aussie household.*
Electronic Goods
Are one of the Top 5 second hand items sold in Australia.*
*Based on 2018 Gumtree Second-Hand Economy Report.
